docs.snippet: A sharp decline in the Canadian dollar featured business in the foreign exchange market last week. Weakness was particularly acute on Tuesday and Wednesday, when remittance on the Dominion sagged to 86.56 cents, a loss of 1 7/16 cents from Monday's...
docs.lead_paragraph: A sharp decline in the Canadian dollar featured business in the foreign exchange market last week. Weakness was particularly acute on Tuesday and Wednesday, when remittance on the Dominion sagged to 86.56 cents, a loss of 1 7/16 cents from Monday's top, and lowest since last January.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED MARCH 21, 1942

docs.snippet: The first comprehensive control of railroad freight traffic for shipments to Latin America to be instituted since the war's outbreak was announced yesterday by the Association of American Railroads. Intended to prevent congestion at shipping points...
docs.lead_paragraph: The first comprehensive control of railroad freight traffic for shipments to Latin America to be instituted since the war's outbreak was announced yesterday by the Association of American Railroads. Intended to prevent congestion at shipping points resulting from shortage of bottoms, the control affects North Atlantic ports from Portland, Me., to Hampton Roads, Va., and restricts the movement of all but government materials unless cargo space has already been booked.

headline.main: RAILS ACT TO BAR PORT CONGESTION; Restrict Freight Movement to Seaboard to U.S. Orders Unless Ship Is Ready

docs.snippet: ALEXANDRIA, Egypt, March 25 -- We feinted and bluffed, dodged in and out of smoke screens, fired our guns -- although it was sometimes like shooting peas at a barn -- took time out for tea in the midst of battle, and got our convoy safely to Malta...
docs.lead_paragraph: ALEXANDRIA, Egypt, March 25 -- We feinted and bluffed, dodged in and out of smoke screens, fired our guns -- although it was sometimes like shooting peas at a barn -- took time out for tea in the midst of battle, and got our convoy safely to Malta after a naval engagement in which valor triumphed over might as it seldom does even in the most romantic of fiction.

docs.snippet: G. Hilmer Lundbeck, general manager of the Swedish American Line in the United States, said yesterday that the steamship Drottningholm, now berthed at Gothenburg, which has been chartered by the United States Government to repatriate American and...
docs.lead_paragraph: G. Hilmer Lundbeck, general manager of the Swedish American Line in the United States, said yesterday that the steamship Drottningholm, now berthed at Gothenburg, which has been chartered by the United States Government to repatriate American and Axis diplomats, will leave that port in ten days and come empty to New York.

docs.snippet: WILL ROGERS once said, "There is more quaintness and different things to see here in Mexico than I saw in the whole of Europe." One aspect of Mexico's quaintness is the names. A study of nomenclature often tells you more about a people than their...
docs.lead_paragraph: WILL ROGERS once said, "There is more quaintness and different things to see here in Mexico than I saw in the whole of Europe." One aspect of Mexico's quaintness is the names. A study of nomenclature often tells you more about a people than their history does, and in Mexico nomenclature shows humor, irony, artistic leanings and grandiloquence.

headline.main: THE HUMOR OF MEXICO; Names of Bars and Stores Reveal Wit and Irony South of Border
